title: Love Taps with Android Wear
summary: A modern day love letter for your watch and phone, just send a few taps.
developerAddress:
8016 Pennsylvania Cir. NE Suite B
Albuquerque, New Mexico 87110
description: A modern day love letter for your watch and phone, just send a few taps to let them know you're thinking of them.  They'll feel the taps exactly as you created them and see the heart move just how you moved it.  It's a small way to stay in touch through a busy day.• Quickly send a few taps to your partner• Beautiful clean design• Quick reply• Android Wear supportNew! Now with full Android Wear support! "Ok, Google.  Start Love Taps" and enjoy!
descriptionHTML:
A modern day love letter for your watch and phone, just send a few taps to let them know you're thinking of them. They'll feel the taps exactly as you created them and see the heart move just how you moved it. It's a small way to stay in touch through a busy day.

• Quickly send a few taps to your partner
• Beautiful clean design
• Quick reply
• Android Wear support

New! Now with full Android Wear support! "Ok, Google. Start Love Taps" and enjoy!
comments: Please add a way to send heart beats from the heart sensor on android wear
Fun app. My GF and use this back and forth to let each other know we are thinking about them. Though I might miss a text, I always feel my Android Wear watch pulse to what my GF has sent.

Awesome developers! Updated my review. Sorry it took me so long! I haven't been able to test it and all since I haven't wore my moto 360 in forever (work doesn't allow watches since we work in food) but if you say you added the functionality then I believe you! 5 stars!
Needs Heartbeat Option Now we just need the ability to send your heartbeat with your Android Wear watch.

really cool! My wife and I both have this on our phones, it's a really neat way to keep in touch while we're away during the day. (sappy I know)  I have the moto 360 watch and I feel the taps on my wrist just as she sent them. Very cool :)
Cute app for couples The interface is very simple and clean, and the idea is more personal than a text message.  It's nice to be able to communicate even when you don't have anything to say.
